title: Diamond Mangalsutra Pendant Necklace - "Aadhunik Tali"
materials: High-Quality Cubic Zirconia (CZ) stones resembling diamonds. Hyderabadi Polish for lasting shine.
features: Delicate rose gold chain interspersed with traditional black beads. Features multiple, exquisitely crafted diamond-studded pendants evenly spaced along the necklace. Modern take on the classic Mangalsutra, perfect for the contemporary Telugu bride.
occasions: Ugadi. Can also be paired with Western or Indo-Western attire.
description: Lightweight and comfortable for everyday use. Combines the auspiciousness of a Mangalsutra with the elegance of a diamond necklace. The rose gold finish adds a touch of modern sophistication. Exquisite craftsmanship ensures durability and lasting beauty. The black beads are believed to ward off evil and bring good luck and health.
